item.description: The DXY rose, but the dollar faces a modest, brief correction and the producer price data could prove the catalyst if it comes in lower than expected,...

item.description: Corporate Japan circles the wagons to protect a national gem, but investor trust will be key.

item.title: Stock Futures Up as Investors Await PPI Data
item.description: Stock futures were slightly higher ahead of producer-price index data.

item.description: The speaker maker’s holiday quarter forecast is lifting its stock, but fallout from last spring’s app fiasco still lingers.

item.title: Why Goldman Stands Out as a Trump-Era Winner on Wall Street
item.description: Booms in dealmaking and private credit would be a double boost for the investment bank.
